text: Edward Pearson may refer to: * Edward Pearson (theologian) (1756–1811), English academic and theologian, Master of Sidney Sussex College, Cambridge * Edward J. Pearson (1863–1928), president of the New York, New Haven and Hartford Railroad * Edward Nathan Pearson (1859–1924), New Hampshire Secretary of State * Edward W. Pearson Sr. (1872–1946), African American entrepreneur * Edward Pearson (soccer), member of the National Soccer Hall of Fame ==See also== *
title: Edward Pearson
